root.title: La-Ventil {appName}
root.description: La-Ventil is the community platform for members, machines, and open badges.

public.title: La-Ventil — Access
public.description: Create an account or sign in to access your member space.

hub.title: La-Ventil — Member Space
hub.description: Manage your profile, badges, machines, and events.

validation.emailAlreadyUsed: This email address is already in use.
validation.emailInvalid: The email address is not valid.

password.minLength: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
password.maxLength: Your password must be at most 20 characters.
password.uppercaseRequired: Your password must include at least one uppercase letter.
password.lowercaseRequired: Your password must include at least one lowercase letter.
password.numberRequired: Your password must include at least one number.
password.specialCharacterRequired: Your password must include at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).

signup.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions.

profile.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions.

resetPassword.success: If your email exists in our database, a password reset link has been sent to you.

fields.terms: I accept the application's terms and conditions

placeholders.passwordConfirmation: same password as the previous field

forgotPassword.title: I forgot my password
forgotPassword.intro: Enter the email you used to sign up.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.subtitle: Information
signup.intro: Welcome to the La-Ventil app. To get started, please fill in the information below.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Information
settings.intro: Update your account information with the sections below.

profile.subtitle: Information
profile.intro: Find all the information related to your account below

profileSettings.title: User profile
profileSettings.subtitle: Information
profileSettings.intro: Update your account information with the sections below.

fabLab.title: Fab lab
fabLab.subtitle: Information
fabLab.intro: Find all the machines available at La-Ventil

card.title: Machine name
card.description: The machine prints 3D parts by depositing melted polymer filament.

openBadges.title: Open Badge
openBadges.subtitle: Information
openBadges.intro: Find available and earned open badges below.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Information
support.intro: Help us improve the La-Ventil app!
support.contact: Found a bug? Send an email to loic.marlexi@gmail.com

guidelines.title: Include several details in your message:

items.subject: use the subject Ventil O.S. - bug
items.details: describe the issue as precisely as possible. Which section of the app? Which button?
items.device: include your phone model and the browser you used to access Ventil O.S.

profileSelector.title: Usage profile
profileSelector.subtitle: Select the profile that matches how you use the place

ventilacteur.label: Ventil'acteur
ventilacteur.description: I learn and participate weekly in the La-Ventil project

eleveLycee.label: High school student
eleveLycee.description: I want to use La-Ventil outside class hours

enseignant.label: Teacher
enseignant.description: I work at the school and use La-Ventil

intervenant.label: Guest speaker
intervenant.description: I run workshops and work within La-Ventil

visiteur.label: Visitor
visiteur.description: I come to La-Ventil to attend an event
